lead_paragraph: Harrah's Entertainment, the casino company, could try to buy Crown's stake in Melco Crown Entertainment to acquire its Macau gambling assets, David Bain an analyst at Sterne, Agee & Leach, wrote in a note to clients.
snippet: Harrah's Entertainment, the world's biggest casino company, may seek to acquire Crown's stake in Melco Crown Entertainment to gain gambling assets in Macau, according to David Bain an analyst at Sterne, Agee & Leach.

headline.main: Harrah's Said to Seek Melco Stake in Macau

abstract: Harrah's Entertainment, the world's biggest casino company, may seek to acquire Crown's stake in Melco Crown Entertainment to gain gambling assets in Macau, according to David Bain an analyst at Sterne, Agee & Leach.
